name: fitbitSync-js
description: Azure Function to sync the Fitbit user telemetry from the Fitbit cloud to a remote data store

scripts.bundle: zip -r dist/bundle.zip node_modules && zip -j dist/bundle.zip fitbitSync.js
scripts.build: npm install && npm run setup && npm run bundle && npm run deploy

author: Vadim Kacherov (https://github.com/vkacherov)
